devdoc.details: Contains all read/view functions from v1, separate from write operations

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

getCurrentLtvBps(address,address).details: This is the actual current LTV = totalDebt / totalCollateral * 10000

getLiquidationLtvBps(address,address).details: Position is liquidatable when currentLTV >= liquidationLtvBps

returns._0: Weighted liquidation threshold in basis points

getPositionValue(address,address).details: Returns collateral and debt values in 8-decimal USD (Comet's priceScale)

getReserveConfigs(address).details: Returns price, LTV (borrow collateral factor), liquidation threshold for each collateral

params.market: The base token address (e.g., USDC) to identify the Comet

returns.configs: Array of reserve configuration data for all collaterals in this market

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: CompoundGatewayView

allActiveBaseTokens().notice: Get all active base tokens (from allActiveComets)

allActiveComets().notice: Get all active Comets (union of local + write gateway registries)

allBaseTokens().notice: Get all base tokens for registered Comets

getBaseTokenInfo(address).notice: Get base token info for a market (debt token)

getComet(address).notice: Get Comet for base token, falling back to write gateway if not found locally

getCurrentLtvBps(address,address).notice: Returns the current LTV (debt/collateral) in basis points

getLiquidationLtvBps(address,address).notice: Returns the liquidation LTV threshold in basis points

getPositionValue(address,address).notice: Get position value for ADL trigger calculation

getReserveConfigs(address).notice: Get reserve configuration data for a Compound market (for frontend LTV calculations)

setWriteGateway(address).notice: Set the write gateway address for syncing Comet registry

syncAllCometsFromWriteGateway().notice: Sync all Comets from write gateway

syncCometFromWriteGateway(address).notice: Sync a Comet from the write gateway to this view gateway

userdoc.notice: View-only gateway for Compound Comet protocol
